<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Orc Sight](/Feats.aspx?ID=84) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Half-Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=86" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 59 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416)

</column>

---

Your orc blood is strong enough to grant you the keen vision of your orc forebears. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415), allowing you to see in darkness and dim light just as well as you can in bright light. However, in darkness, you see in black and white only.

**Special** You can take this feat only at 1st level, and you can’t retrain out of this feat or into this feat.
name: Orc Sight
